sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useMemo, useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './AdminDashboard.css'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [adminProfile, setAdminProfile] = useState({ name: 'Admin', email: '' }); useEffect(() => { const storedAdmin = localStorage.getItem('adminData'); if (storedAdmin) { try { const parsed = JSON.parse(storedAdmin); setAdminProfile({ name: parsed?.name || parsed?.fullName || parsed?.username || 'Admin', email: parsed?.email || parsed?.contactEmail || '', }); } catch (error) { console.warn('Unable to parse admin profile from localStorage.', error); } } }, []); const formattedDate = useMemo(() => { try { return new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-US', { weekday: 'long', month: 'long', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric', }).format(new Date()); } catch (error) { return new Date().toLocaleDateString(); } }, []); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('adminToken'); localStorage.removeItem('adminData'); navigate('/admin'); }; const actionButtons = [ { label: 'Create Note', variant: 'primary', onClick: () => navigate('/admin/notes'), }, { label: 'Schedule Timetable', variant: 'secondary', onClick: () => navigate('/admin/timetable'), }, { label: 'Logout', variant: 'outline', onClick: handleLogout, }, ]; const summaryStats = [ { title: 'Notes Uploaded', value: '128', trend: '+12% vs last term', intent: 'positive', icon: 'ðŸ—‚ï¸', }, { title: 'Active Announcements', value: '6', trend: '2 pending approvals', intent: 'warning', icon: 'ðŸ“£', }, { title: 'Upcoming MCQ Sessions', value: '4', trend: '3 scheduled this week', intent: 'neutral', icon: 'ðŸ“', }, { title: 'Resources Reviewed', value: '92%', trend: 'Quality score this month', intent: 'positive', icon: 'âœ…', }, ]; const managementCards = [ { title: 'Upload Notes', description: 'Keep syllabi and course notes current for every semester.', icon: 'ðŸ“˜', action: () => navigate('/admin/notes'), }, { title: 'Timetable', description: 'Coordinate classes with uploads or build schedules visually.', icon: 'ðŸ—“ï¸', action: () => navigate('/admin/timetable'), }, { title: 'Important Notes', description: 'Craft announcements and deliver updates at the right moment.', icon: 'ðŸ“¢', action: () => navigate('/admin/important-notes'), }, { title: 'MCQ Tests', description: 'Design assessments and monitor performance trends.', icon: 'ðŸŽ¯', action: () => navigate('/admin/mcq'), }, ]; const insightPanels = [ { title: 'Course Coverage', metric: '85%', description: 'Departments with refreshed study material in the last 30 days.', intent: 'positive', }, { title: 'Student Reach', metric: '4.8k', description: 'Learners notified via important updates across all terms.', intent: 'neutral', }, { title: 'Review Queue', metric: '3', description: 'Announcements awaiting validation before publication.', intent: 'warning', }, ]; const timelineItems = [ { time: '09:45', title: 'Uploaded new notes', description: 'Digital Logic â€” Semester 3 resource pack published.', intent: 'success', }, { time: '08:30', title: 'Important note drafted', description: 'Lab safety briefing queued for review.', intent: 'info', }, { time: 'Yesterday', title: 'MCQ session scheduled', description: 'Thermodynamics mock test confirmed for Friday.', intent: 'success', }, { time: '2 days ago', title: 'Timetable revision', description: 'Updated Semester 5 schedule with lab allocations.', intent: 'info', }, ]; const handleCardKeyDown = (event, action) => { if (event.key === 'Enter' || event.key === ' ') { event.preventDefault(); action(); } }; return (
ðŸŽ“

Welcome back, {adminProfile.name || 'Admin'}!

Orchestrate study resources, announcements, and assessments from a single, elegant workspace.

{stat.icon}

{stat.value}

{stat.title}

{stat.trend}
))}

Navigate through the core admin tools to keep your student community engaged.

handleCardKeyDown(event, card.action)} > {card.icon}

{card.title}

{card.description}

))}
